attributes.action: explain to the electorate how it is possible for foreigners who are also criminals to be invited in by members of the House of Lords and welcomed to this country yet an elected member of the Dutch government - a citizen of an EU partner country - can be denied entry.  He should also explain why it is possible to deny access to an EU citizen from Holland while not being able to deny access to any one of the many hundreds of thousands of EU citizens from Poland who now infest this country!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Dutch government would be justified in now placing a blanket ban on any member of the british population entering Holland.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
